text: Hello. I'm Jennifer and I'd like to welcome you to my channel, where you can learn American English.
Here on YouTube many know me as JenniferESL. My channel, my website, my
ELT blog, and all my social media accounts are under the name English with Jennifer.
The videos and resources I create are for English language learners and teachers around the world.
My goal is to create quality content to help you communicate more confidently and effectively in English.
I put a bit of my life and all of my heart into my lessons, so if you bring enthusiasm
to your language studies, we'll be a good fit.
Be sure to use my playlists to target the skills and topics you need most.
The complete list of videos is on my website.
Please remember to subscribe to my channel so that you get notification of all my new videos.
I invite you to join the English with Jennifer
community to get the very most I can offer you here on YouTube.
If memberships are available in your country,
you'll see the join button on my channel. Click to learn how you can study more with me.
I wish you all happy studies.
